title: [Large-scale] Ethical Design Education Course Based on Sensitive Design Situations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic principles of design, understanding of science education methodologies, and fundamental proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Educational design incorporating real-life problems to cultivate ethical design thinking among pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ethical dilemma scenarios and evaluate their impact on design decisions.
Learners can propose prototype designs and improvements that reflect sensitive user needs.

Learners will apply five ethical principles (transparency, fairness, accountability, respect, sustainability) at each stage of the scientific research design process (problem definition, method design, result interpretation), identify three or more ethical issues, and write a 1,500-character critical reflection report proposing improvement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
